%c[pda_white]The Foundation%c[ui_gray_1] are a new unknown group who have entered the zone.
 
%c[pda_green]Information%c[ui_gray_1] 
They are professionals with their work, being well-planned and having excellent preparation to research the zone.
 
They have high tech equipment with them at all times and are well skilled.
 
Whatever brought them here, it seems they want to study the zone. They have been working with some factions in order to learn more about the zone.
